results.deck: First appearing as an unnamed tech demo at E3 2005, Eight Days was officially announced at the Sony E3 press conference before being canceled shortly after.
results.name: Eight Days

results.deck: Rock Band Metal Track Pack is a standalone game that packages up 20 metal songs from Rock Band's library.  It includes songs from Black Tide, Judas Priest, Rage Against The Machine, and more.
results.name: Rock Band: Metal Track Pack

results.deck: A PS3 game developed by Silicon Studio that mixes old-school 2D gameplay with 3D graphics and character creation.
results.name: 3D Dot Game Heroes

results.deck: An all new for 2009 hunting and fishing game.
results.name: Cabela's Outdoor Adventures

results.deck: Join three friends in 10 real bowling locations and journey from amateur to tour pro.
results.name: Brunswick Pro Bowling

results.deck: As young thief Tepeu, you accompany the enormously powerful but simple Majin across a world lost to darkness to save the kingdom and fulfill his destiny in this new action-adventure title from Namco Bandai and Yoshiki Okamoto.
results.name: Majin and the Forsaken Kingdom

results.deck: Rock Band 3 spices up the brand with the addition of a keyboard peripheral as well as "Pro Mode," and offers eighty-three new songs to rock out to.
results.name: Rock Band 3

results.deck: Karaoke Revolution returns with new music, characters, and venues.
results.name: Karaoke Revolution

results.deck: A fun kart racing gaming with everyone's favorite animal escapees.
results.name: Madagascar Kartz

results.deck: A high-school romance based visual novel for the PS2 and Xbox 360, developed and published by 5pb.
results.name: Memories Off 6: T-Wave

results.deck: A high definition re-release of God of War and God of War II for PlayStation 3.
results.name: God of War Collection

results.deck: SBK 09 simulates the 2009 season of the World Superbike Championship for consoles and PC.
results.name: SBK: Superbike World Championship 09

results.deck: An instalment in the popular karaoke franchise which lets you sing songs of various Motown Artist.
results.name: SingStar Motown

results.deck: Enslaved: Odyssey to the West is an action adventure game developed by Ninja Theory and published by Namco-Bandai. A very loose retelling of "Journey to the West," Enslaved follows the story of Monkey and Trip as they attempt to cross a post-apocalyptic Planet Earth.
results.name: Enslaved: Odyssey to the West

results.deck: Skate 3 features a cooperative career mode, new tricks, a robust set of community features, and a suite of creation tools for logos, films, and skate parks.
results.name: Skate 3

results.deck: The second, and most popular, entry in the Science Adventure series of visual novels. Centers around a group of friends who accidentally invent a device that can send text messages back in time, sparking a pandemonium of alternate timelines and conspiracies. El Psy Kongroo.
results.name: Steins;Gate

results.deck: BlazBlue returns in the form of an updated and rebalanced version of BlazBlue: Calamity Trigger. With new modes, moves, characters, stages and fight mechanics.
results.name: BlazBlue: Continuum Shift

results.deck: MotoGP 09/10 is the latest installment in the MotoGP series.
results.name: MotoGP 09/10

results.deck: The prequel to Record of Agarest War and a tactical role playing game developed by Compile Heart and Red Entertainment.
results.name: Record of Agarest War Zero

results.deck: Super Street Fighter IV is a standalone update to its predecessor, adding new characters, modes, and online features.
results.name: Super Street Fighter IV

results.deck: Mahjong Fight Club game for PS3 and PSP
results.name: Mahjong Fight Club: Zenkoku Taisenban

results.deck: Angel Senki is a fantasy MMORPG for Sony systems and PC.
results.name: Angel Senki

results.deck: Jurassic: The Hunted is a sci-fi first-person shooter developed by Cauldron in which you travel back in time using 13 different weapons to survive 12 levels of dino shooting action. It's up to Dylan to figure out what the foxtrot is going on in the Bermuda Triangle.
results.name: Jurassic: The Hunted

results.deck: The latest game in the Scene It? series continues to have the great 4 player trivia action of the original games but will now be available on all three consoles.
results.name: Scene It? Bright Lights! Big Screen!

results.deck: The third Disney Sing It game.
results.name: Disney Sing It: Pop Hits

results.deck: A side story of the original game, Avalon No Nazo ("Mystery of Avalon") is a strategy RPG released exclusively on the PS3.
results.name: Tears to Tiara Gaiden: Avalon no Nazo

results.deck: In the third game in Insomniac's Resistance franchise, you will play as Joseph Capelli, murderer of previous protagonist Nathan Hale, as he journeys across the Chimera-controlled United States.
results.name: Resistance 3

results.deck: Fist of the North Star: Ken's Rage is a brutal third-person brawler based on the hyper-gory post-apocalyptic action anime and manga series Fist of the North Star. You are already dead.
results.name: Fist of the North Star:  Ken's Rage

results.deck: An action game set in the Ivalice universe from the Final Fantasy series. The project was originally in development at GRIN but has since been moved to a different yet-undisclosed studio.
results.name: Fortress (working title)

results.deck: The third game in the Ar tonelico series, and the first on PlayStation 3.
results.name: Ar tonelico Qoga: Knell of Ar Ciel

results.deck: The ninth game in the Buzz! series of trivia quiz games.
results.name: Buzz! Quiz World

results.deck: Inversion puts you in destructible, gravity-shifting environments, giving control over futuristic weapons like the Gravlink. With said weapon, players can move objects for cover, assault on enemies, or solve puzzles.
results.name: Inversion

results.deck: Sony online entertainment joins forces with Wizards of the Coast to bring us a new turn based strategy game based on the popular card game.
results.name: Magic: The Gathering - Tactics

results.deck: EA Sports' college basketball title with former Oklahoma forward Blake Griffin as the cover athlete.
results.name: NCAA Basketball 10

results.deck: Based on the Discovery Channel series of the same name, Man vs. Wild follows former commando Bear Grylls into remote areas as he demonstrates how to survive harsh weather, hostile animals, and other natural dangers.
results.name: Man vs. Wild

results.deck: Only the deadliest of catches can be found in Sea of Chaos.
results.name: Deadliest Catch: Sea of Chaos

results.deck: Based on the movie based on the comic book character, Thor lets you step into the shoes of the titular god of thunder in order to use his mighty hammer Mjolnir against the forces of evil, led by Thor's stepbrother, the evil Loki.
results.name: Thor: God of Thunder

results.deck: An open-world horror game following eccentric FBI Agent Francis York Morgan (and his imaginary friend, Zach) as he investigates a brutal murder in the small town of Greenvale.
results.name: Deadly Premonition

results.deck: A somewhat simplified roguelike originally developed for the GBA and subsequently ported to several different platforms.
results.name: POWDER

results.deck: Disney released a new game to go along with the 2010 film release, Tron Legacy. This game is a prequel to the movie forming a bridge (but not a Jeff bridge) between the original and the 2010 film.
results.name: Tron: Evolution

results.deck: The Mercenaries series was set to continue with an online-focused third title, but Pandemic Studios was closed in November 2009. Electronic Arts claimed to continue working on the franchise, but nothing has been heard about the game since.
results.name: Mercs Inc.

results.deck: Ubisoft returns to the Sands of Time universe for a fourth time in this May 2010 release, set in between the first two games in the trilogy and coinciding with the release of the Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time movie.
results.name: Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands

results.deck: Step into the boots of Tier 1 Operatives Rabbit and Deuce in this modern take on EA's long-running Medal of Honor series; the game features separately-developed single player and multiplayer modes.
results.name: Medal of Honor

results.deck: The third entry in the anime girl-focused fighting game series, released in Japanese arcades with a home version for PS3 and Xbox 360.
results.name: Arcana Heart 3

results.deck: UFC Undisputed 2010 is the second installment of the UFC Undisputed franchise.
results.name: UFC Undisputed 2010

results.deck: A depiction of the beginning of the infamous war between the noble Autobots and the nefarious Decepticons, set on the Transformers' homeworld, Cybertron, long before they had even heard of humans or the planet Earth.
results.name: Transformers: War For Cybertron

results.deck: Following the events of the first game, Darth Vader clones a replacement Starkiller, who again rebels against his master.
results.name: Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II

results.deck: Green Day: Rock Band is Harmonix's second installment in their flagship series' band-centric spin-off, and exclusively features the work of the highly-popular punk-rock group Green Day.
results.name: Green Day: Rock Band

results.deck: Originally known as "Black Lotus", and then "True Crime: Hong Kong", Sleeping Dogs is an open-world action game that tells the story of undercover cop Wei Shen as he infiltrates the ranks of the murderous Triads in Hong Kong.
results.name: Sleeping Dogs

results.deck: When Gotham City's slums have been transformed into a secluded super-prison, it's up to Batman to uncover its conspiracy in the sequel to 2009's Batman: Arkham Asylum.
results.name: Batman: Arkham City

results.deck: Spec Ops: The Line is a narrative-driven modern military third-person shooter set in Dubai during the aftermath of a series of destructive sandstorms.
results.name: Spec Ops: The Line

results.deck: Game based on the movie by the same name in which dragons are slain mercilessly by a Viking tribe.
results.name: How to Train Your Dragon

results.deck: Sony's award-winning baseball franchise returns for the 2010 season with another installment of The Show. New features including Road to The Show Version 4.0 now enabling you to call the game as a catcher as well as the return of the Home Run Derby.
results.name: MLB 10: The Show

results.deck: Naughty Bear is a third-person action game about a psychotic teddy bear that preys on the innocent inhabitants of an island because he was not invited to a birthday party.
results.name: Naughty Bear

results.deck: Nier Replicant is an alternate version of Nier, released only in Japan for the Playstation 3.
results.name: Nier Replicant

results.deck: Return to the roots of arcade NBA basketball in the 2010 installment of NBA Jam. Developed by EA Canada for seventh-generation game consoles, this rebirth brings back the gameplay, aesthetics, and gratuitous secrets of the original 1993 arcade game.
results.name: NBA Jam

results.deck: Dragon Age: Origins - Awakening is a full retail expansion pack for Dragon Age: Origins.
results.name: Dragon Age: Origins - Awakening

results.deck: The latest game in the Black Bean racing series, developed in cooperation with professional racing driver, Gianni Morbidelli.
results.name: Superstars V8 Next Challenge

results.deck: This year's Madden is the 22nd in the annual installment and features the slogan "Simpler, Quicker, Deeper".
results.name: Madden NFL 11

results.deck: The reboot to the Armored Core franchise, Armored Core V takes place in the wake of a global catastrophe where humanity fights over world resources.
results.name: Armored Core V

results.deck: DJ Hero 2 adds freestyle scratching and crossfading, as well as scored vocal gameplay to the mix in this DJ-ing rhythm game.
results.name: DJ Hero 2

results.deck: Racquet Sports
results.name: Racquet Sports

results.deck: A board and card game compilation for the PS3
results.name: 20 All-Time Favorites

results.deck: An upcoming racing game from Edge
results.name: Racers

results.deck: The 2010 entry in EA's pro golf sim.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 11

results.deck: 2010 FIFA World Cup South Africa is the latest in EA Sports' FIFA World Cup series and it not only improves on 2006 FIFA World Cup Germany, but also adds some key elements popularized by FIFA 10 and UEFA EURO 2008
results.name: 2010 FIFA World Cup South Africa

results.deck: Take the fight to evil Russian robots using a rocket-powered self-adapting battlesuit in this innovative third-person shooter from Resident Evil creator Shinji Mikami.
results.name: Vanquish

results.deck: SingStar Latino is a Playstation exclusive featuring over 20 Latin artists.
results.name: SingStar Latino

results.deck: The sequel to Level 5's PS3 exclusive, White Knight Chronicles. It was released in Japan in 2010, and in America in September  2011.
results.name: White Knight Chronicles II

results.deck: A game based on the Tom Cruise movie of the same name.  Cole Hauser reprises his role as Rowdy Burns.  NASCAR drivers appear exclusively on the PS3 version.
results.name: Days of Thunder: NASCAR Edition

results.deck: When Earth begins to fall in an ancient cycle of destruction, Commander Shepard must unite the forces of the galaxy to stop the Reapers in the infamous final chapter of the first Mass Effect trilogy.
results.name: Mass Effect 3

results.deck: Developed by Milestone, this is the latest officially licensed World Superbike Championship game.
results.name: SBK X: Superbike World Championship

results.deck: This sequel to the colorful "splatformer", de Blob 2 takes all the color from the titular hero's home city AGAIN and requires him to save it. It also introduces a host of new features.
results.name: de Blob 2

results.deck: Players return to the post-Apocalypse in the sequel to 2010's Darksiders, this time as former protagonist War's fellow Horseman of the Apocalypse, Death, the pale rider, who seeks to resurrect Humanity to clear his brother's good name.
results.name: Darksiders II

results.deck: MLB 2K10 is 2K Sports latest Major League Baseball game. Evan Longoria is the featured cover athlete.
results.name: Major League Baseball 2K10

results.deck: The latest in the series of Traveler's Tales' LEGO games brings Star Wars: The Clone Wars into the fold. New features include: a new pseudo-RTS gameplay mode, improved animations and lighting, and more direct in-game model assembly.
results.name: LEGO Star Wars III: The Clone Wars

results.deck: The 19th annual release of EA's successful NHL franchise introduces a Canadian Hockey League license and a new real-time physics engine.
results.name: NHL 11

results.deck: EA's upcoming college pigskin game will feature new locomotion player movements, new equipment, formation subs, and more. Former University of Florida quarterback and Heisman Trophy Tim Tebow will grace the cover of this year's edition.
results.name: NCAA Football 11

results.deck: Rock of the Dead is an on-rails shooter in which players "shoot" enemies by 'plucking' a specific note pattern using a guitar controller peripheral.
results.name: Rock of the Dead

results.deck: The sixth core entry in Activision's Guitar Hero series represents the last entry developed by Neversoft.
results.name: Guitar Hero: Warriors of Rock

results.deck: A video game based on the movie of the same name.
results.name: Arthur and the Revenge of Maltazard

results.deck: Players take control of Buzz, Woody, and Jessie as they explore the world of Toy Story and much more.
results.name: Toy Story 3: The Video Game

results.deck: Mobile Suit Gundam: Extreme VS. brings the Gundam VS series into the HD era, and includes Mobile Suits from Mobile Suit Crossbone Gundam, Mobile Suit Gundam SEED Astray, Mobile Suit Gundam MS IGLOO, and much, much more!
results.name: Mobile Suit Gundam Extreme VS.

results.deck: Stylish, ludicrous kills net big points in this ridiculously over-the-top first-person shooter.
results.name: Bulletstorm

results.deck: The newest game in the long-running KOF series. The Ash Saga comes to a close as more than 30 characters face off against each other in 3-on-3 combat.
results.name: The King of Fighters XIII

results.deck: A skateboarding game starring Shaun White by Ubisoft Montreal. Brought to you by Stride gum!
results.name: Shaun White Skateboarding

results.deck: Zipper Interactive returns to the SOCOM series with a new installment on PlayStation 3 that features squad-based gameplay, 32 player online modes, and PlayStation Move support.
results.name: SOCOM 4: U.S. Navy SEALs

results.deck: A PS3/Xbox 360 entry in Koei's long-running Nobunaga's Ambition strategy game series.
results.name: Nobunaga no Yabou: Tendou

results.deck: Ubisoft's soccer-sim for the Xbox 360, PS3, and PC.
results.name: Pure Futbol

results.deck: Described as "Gun-porn 2.0," Bodycount is Codemasters Studios Guildford's arcade style first-person shooter for the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3.
results.name: Bodycount

results.deck: Play a guitar controller with real strings in this rhythm game from Seven45 Studios.
results.name: PowerGig: Rise of the SixString

results.deck: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning is an open-world singleplayer RPG with combo-based action and the trappings of an MMORPG. Reckoning is set in Amalur, the same setting as 38 Studios' planned MMO codenamed "Copernicus."
results.name: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning

results.deck: The second installment in the EA Sports Active franchise, and the first to be released on platforms other than the Wii.
results.name: EA Sports Active 2.0

results.deck: Table tennis, gladiator battles, and more await you in this Move-enabled minigame compilation. It released in conjunction with the PlayStation Move and is available in various bundles.
results.name: Sports Champions

results.deck: A collection of minigames for the PlayStation Move that puts the player's image on the screen and allows them to interact with in-game objects and characters.
results.name: Start the Party

results.deck: The Fight: Lights Out is a fighting simulator on the PlayStation 3 that utilizes the PlayStation Move motion controls, 3D technology, & Danny Trejo.
results.name: The Fight: Lights Out

results.deck: TV Superstars is a PlayStation Move title that has players competing for ultimate TV stardom by putting you through a series of interactive game & television show scenarios.
results.name: TV Superstars

results.deck: A comedic game where players use the PlayStation Move wand to slide around on office chairs and other vehicles and use Kung Fu skills to make some money while avoiding the Triad.
results.name: Kung Fu Rider
